name: False Reality Mix
description:
yet another checkpoint merge on Civitai :)

About

This is a merge of few checkpoints and LoRAs from Civitai and Huggingface thrown together into a mix that I like. I've found that It can do a little bit of everything (or everything that I have thrown at it). I've mostly tested it on portraits of people, fantasy, and horror themes.

Constructive feedback is always appreciated.

Usage

Place it in the directory where you keep your models. I found that it works well with longer prompts. The use of sensible negative negative prompts, as always, is recommended.

Thanks

Attribution in merges of merges is hard (impossible?), but, a shout out to the following creators, who's work I like,and found its way into this mix.

SG_161222

Zoyva

Cyberdelia

epinikion

theally
